definition.text: Superalgos is a platform that integrates different projects with the goal of automating operation acrross any of them, and extracting valuable information from their own blockchains in order to use them in trading strategies.

paragraphs.text: The first project is Superalgos itselft, witch provides a lowest level infraestructure that any other integrated project can freely reuse. On the pipeline we have these projects waiting to be integrated soon:

Once integrated, each project will provide even more infraestructure which can later be used by other projects to be integrated after that. For example, once Ethereum is fully integrated, it will enable DeFi projects to be integrated on top of it.
